Abstract: Actor Harris Yulin discusses current role in Arthur Miller's play The Price, and reputation for playing 'bad guys' over 40-year career in film and on stage, interview; photo (M)
Snippet: Actor Harris Yulin discusses current role in Arthur Miller's play The Price, and reputation for playing 'bad guys' over 40-year career in film and on stage, interview; photo (M)
LeadParagraph: Harris Yulin doesn't have a killer's face, but if you saw him walking down the street you could be excused for taking cover.

Headline.Main: A Good Run for Actor Who Specializes in Bad
Headline.PrintHeadline: A Good Run for Actor Who Specializes in Bad
